title: Wang Yi (pastor)
summary: Wang Yi (Chinese: 王怡; pinyin: Wáng Yí; born June 1, 1973), pen name Wang Shuya (Chinese: 王书亚; pinyin: Wáng Shūyà), is the founding pastor of the Early Rain Covenant Church (Chinese: 秋雨圣约教会; pinyin: Qiūyǔ Shèngyuē Jiàohuì), a Calvinist house church in Chengdu. He is also a productive writer, editor, and social activist, and was a legal scholar at Chengdu University before he resigned to take up the pastorate.
